Directions: Cook broccoli according to package directions; drain. In a bowl, combine the soup, bread crumbs, cheese, onion, pimientos and seasonings. Add broccoli; mix well. Spoon 1/4 cup onto each ham slice and roll up.
Arrange in an ungreased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 40 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
12 slices fully cooked ham (1/8 inch thick)
